title: Target | Sr. Engineer | Bengaluru
content:

Years of Experience: 6 years
Prior Experience: A Large MNC in Finance
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Target India
Title/Level: Sr. Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: INR 37,00,000
Signing Bonus: INR 2,00,000
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: INR 3,70,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 42,70,000 (1st Year)
Benefits: Standard Target India Benefits
Other details: Declined the Offer

title: Paypal SWE intern (Summer 2024)
content:
Education: Third year Btech - Computer Science & Engineering (Batch 2025)
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Two internships in small startups (~3 months each)

Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Paypal
Title/Level: Software engineering intern (SWE) - summer 2024
Location: Banglore/Chennai/Hyderabad (Not finalised yet)
Salary: ₹ 1,00,000 per month
Relocation/Signing Bonus: ₹1,00,000 (to be disbursed in two installments)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹ 4,00,000 for three months

Hiring mode: Offcampus, through careers portal
OA + 2 Interviews rounds
Technical round - 1 medium & 1 hard DSA ques
Managerial round - projects, prev internships, etc

title: Google | L3 | Bangalore ( Accepted )
content:
Education: BTech from tier 2/3 institute.
Years of Experience: 1 year 10 months
Prior Experience: Backend dev at a mid size startup
Date of the Offer: 22 April 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 22L base
Relocation / Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: $54k USD ( 38%, 32%, 20%, 10% )
Bonus: 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 47L for the first year
Benefits: Standard google benefits
Other details: none
